mapper.delete: DELETE from immessagechatgroupsmanager where chatgroupsid = #{chatgroupsid} and owner = #{owner}
mapper.select: SELECT * from immessagechatgroupsmanager where chatgroupsid = #{chatgroupsid} and owner = #{owner}
mapper.update: UPDATE immessagechatgroupsmanager set `type` = #{type} where chatgroupsid = #{chatgroupsid} and owner = #{owner}
